resources.string: Welcome to your math practice session!
This is where you get to practice the concepts you picked out in a fun and rewarding environment!
Have fun practicing your math concepts! Get started with this awesome question!
Use the grid to enter your answer! The grid will change depending on the type of question.
When you\'re confident with your answer, hit this check button to go to the next question!
The blue bar tells you how many more questions you have to solve to complete the session.\n\nThe gold bar counts down your XP multiplier. The faster you solve a question, the more XP you get!
